definitions: The act of supporting and moving (someone or something) from one place to another.
The act of having or holding something, especially while moving.
The act of conveying or transporting.
The act of having a particular quality or feature.
The act of winning or succeeding in something.
examples: She is carrying a heavy bag.
The bridge is carrying a lot of traffic.
The team is carrying the hopes of the nation.
The wind is carrying the sound.
